Pre-Game Insights: Shimron Hetmyer returns to the West Indies squad for the ODI series against England, having last played an ODI in December 2023.
The first ODI between West Indies and England will be played in Antigua on October 31, 2024.
Liam Livingstone will lead the England team as regular captain Jos Buttler is recovering from a calf injury.
West Indies head coach Darren Sammy expressed excitement about the upcoming ODI series, noting that matches against England are always exciting and challenging.
17-year-old Jewel Andrew, who impressed on the Sri Lanka tour, will bring new energy to the West Indies team.
